title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: January 19, 2023, 04:47:11 PMLast edit: July 11, 2023, 03:34:39 PM by cygan
content: as the title says, we at Icarus will try to make it possible for all old Coldkey collectors who have collected cards/editions with certain serials to continue to do so with the same serial number at Icarus so i would ask you all to make a short post with your 'reserved' old Coldkey serial#i will then create a list here in the op for overview purposes thensince i have already received some messages regarding this, this user is already listed in the overviewCode:krogothmanhattan------ #1 #2---------------------- #3 (was unlocked again by comit)chronicsky------------ #4LitLitBit------------- #5seek3r---------------- #6minerjones------------ #7haloxon--------------- #8geophphreigh---------- #9Agrawas--------------- #11Mitchell-------------- #15Humble Bitcoiners----- #17sunnybwoy------------- #18Hookzup1-------------- #19 #20 #21MoparMiningLLC-------- #76

comments.author: sunnybwoy
comments.body: I had #18¬† but if #3 is available I will take that number thank you.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: sunnybwoy on January 19, 2023, 05:25:27 PMI had #18¬† but if #3 is available I will take that number thank you.have taken you first with the #18we wait first, which serials are assigned

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: I had #9 history series. #13 is my fav. Happy to have either one. Geo

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: If #17 is available put me on the list for itüçÄ

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Thank you cygan for updating my spots, I can send pics for proof if needed, my 19 amd 21 sets are complete¬† but I am missing a couple 20s as I was late to the party but would still continue acquiring all same matching numbers going forward

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: I would like to request #11 if no one has claimed it. If someone already has a set for it and would like to continue, I am happy to give it up..

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Agrawas on February 08, 2023, 03:37:26 PMI would like to request #11 if no one has claimed it. If someone already has a set for it and would like to continue, I am happy to give it up..have added you to the list. also Humble Bitcoiners with his #17to avoid any cheating here, i ask the users who claim an already occupied serial# to provide me with a proof of his ck-cards at that time with well recognizable serial number and username

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: at one point, I had #14 - this was specific to the pokemon styled cards though - and since I never received the 20 card set that I paid for, that might as well be moot.
